code: import React from'react';import'./App.css';import Board from'@lourenci/react-kanban';var board={lanes:[{id:1,title:'To-do',cards:[{id:1,title:'Add card',description:'Add capability to add a card in a lane'}]},{id:2,title:'Doing',cards:[{id:2,title:'Drag-n-drop support',description:'Move a card between the lanes'}]},{id:3,title:'Done',cards:[{id:3,title:'Drag-n-drop support',description:'Move a card between the lanes'}]}]};function App(){return React.createElement("div",null,"hi o",React.createElement(Board,{initialBoard:board,allowAddLane:false,allowRemoveLane:false,allowRemoveCard:true}));}export default App;
